data.text: @CoCo197777 Let's be real here Granny this has nothing to do with the Kids it's to do with the fact that you Leftists felt like your Political Authority was undermined when DeSantis gave Kids the option to Rebel against your Mask Mandates

@politicalawake DeSantis was clearly trying to intimidate those kids, coerce them@l into removing their masks for his comfort. He is in a position of authority. He should never use that authority against high s hook kids. There. Educating you was my good deed of the day. https://t.co/ISok1r4SZB
@CoCo197777 Grandma you're the one who's on my Thread so it's actually you who needs to peddle your bullshit somewhere else not me
@politicalawake I’m sorry, but you don’t know the definition of bullying. I’m a trained education professional. Go peddle your bullsh*t somewhere else.
@politicalawake An adult doing that most certainly is. I’ll bet Putin started out bullying kids. No doubt DeSantis admires him.
@CoCo197777 Telling Kids they don't need to wear Masks isn't bullying
@politicalawake A man bullying high school students for wearing masks is wrong.
